item.title: MIUI V13.0.10.0.SLJCNXM Recovery update for Redmi K50G China
item.description:
New Stable Beta Recovery update available!

Device: Redmi K50G China

Codename: ingres

Version: V13.0.10.0.SLJCNXM | 12.0

Size: 5.0 GB

MD5: 8fca36d0eb45509bdfa65009d176875b

Changelog:
[Highlights]
Fix: Couldn't take screenshots in some cases
[Mi Smart Hub]
New: Mi Smart Hub now allows transferring audio and video playback to other connected devices
New: You can now use Mi Smart Hub for app handoff across connected devices
New: Mi Smart Hub now offers options for your smartphones, tablets, and TVs
New: You can control your devices and use Mi Smart Hub in Control center now
[Camera]
Fix: The Camera app was force closed in some cases
[Other improvements and optimizations]
Optimization: System stability
Optimization: Usability
